meta_description: New Museum Los Gatos is bringing art, innovation, history and Bay Area Stories to the wide audience of Silicon Valley.
hours_text:
Menu

## **NUMU LOCATION**

106 E. Main Street  
Los Gatos, CA 95030  
**Phone** 408.354.2646  
**Email** [**operations@numulosgatos.org**](mailto:operations@numulosgatos.org)

### **[**[**Museum Parking Zone Map**](/s/NUMUParkingMap-syry.pdf)**﻿ ]**

## **MAILING ADDRESS**

P.O. Box 1904  
Los Gatos, CA 95031

## **MUSEUM HOURS***

 **THU - SUN** 10 AM-4 PM   
The [**Collections Lab**](https://www.numulosgatos.org/exhibitions-2/collections-lab) is **closed** on Thursdays.  
*See our Holiday Closures below.

* * *

## **ADMISSION**

**$10** General Admission  
**$6** **(with valid ID)** Seniors, military & students  
**FREE** Los Gatos residents, [**NUMU members**](/membership), youth under 18 years of age, families up to 4 (with current [**EBT**](https://www.ebt.ca.gov/cardholder/) card & valid ID), Santa Clara County Library District & San José Public Library cardholders if pre-registered through [**Discover & Go**](https://sccl.discoverandgo.net/), NARM Members**, Muwekma Ohlone Tribal Members, & active-duty military personnel & their families.   
**  
****NUMU is a member of the[**North American Reciprocal Museum Association**](https://narmassociation.org/) (NARM). NUMU members of [**Patron Level and above**](/membership/#block-d3e3ff2a517cf84a26d0) receive free and reduced admission to [**institutions across the continent**](https://narmassociation.org/members/), and NARM members from other institutions receive free admission to NUMU.[ **Become a member.**](/membership/#...
